title: Did the Trump administration make immigrants pay $800 for DNA tests to get their kids back?
subtitle: A few parents in Texas said that they had been told by social workers that they would have to pay for DNA testing to reunite with separated migrant children.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Tramp Immigration Department had to pay $800 for DNA tests in order to obtain the return of children taken under its "no tolerance" policy.
